name: Exorcist
ability: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.

legacy.otherNightReminder: The Exorcist points to a player, different from the previous night. If that player is the Demon: Wake the Demon and show the 'This character selected you' card and the Exorcist token, then put the Demon to sleep. The Demon does not act tonight.

otherNights.description: Each night*, choose a player (different to last night): the Demon, if chosen, learns who you are then doesn't wake tonight.
